bibl.title: P. Köln (Pap. Theol. 53–60) + P.BYU (091 D562e): Three Binding Strips Preserving Sirach (38.28.4-39.4.4).
bibl.note: Edition of three strips of parchment used to strengthen the gathering of papyrus sheets of P. Tura (codex V; = van Haelst 644; LDAB 776) and stabilize them for binding. IVth century.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Brigham Young Univ. Inv. 091 D562e + P. Colon. Inv. Pap. Theol. 53-60
Wayment Thomas A., P. Köln (Pap. Theol. 53–60) + P.BYU (091 D562e): Three Binding Strips Preserving Sirach (38.28.4-39.4.4).
Edition of three strips of parchment used to strengthen the gathering of papyrus sheets of P. Tura (codex V; = van Haelst 644; LDAB 776) and stabilize them for binding. IVth century.
